---
title: "Peter (Simon Peter)"
---
**The Bold Leader**

**Strengths:** Courageous, passionate, quick to act

**Role in God’s Story:** Peter’s impulsiveness becomes bold leadership. He fails, learns, and becomes the rock of the early church. He reminds us that even imperfect faith can be world-changing when anchored in love.

**Where he shows up in the Gospels:**

* [Matthew 4:18–20](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Matthew+4%3A18-20&version=NIV) – Called by Jesus while fishing
* [Matthew 14:22–33](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Matthew+14%3A22-33&version=NIV) – Walks on water
* [Luke 22:54–62](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Luke+22%3A54-62&version=NIV) – Denies Jesus three times
* [John 21:15–19](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=John+21%3A15-19&version=NIV) – Restored and commissioned by Jesus
